message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for a competitive price of $13,500. I believe it offers significant value, but I'm open to discussing the price further.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value in the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within $8,000. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $9,500?

I appreciate your counteroffer, Bob.  While I'm willing to negotiate, $9,500 is a bit too low for me. Could you consider $11,500? I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and provide significant value.

I understand your position, Alice. I'm willing to increase my offer to $10,000, which is still below your asking price but closer to what I'm comfortable spending. I hope this helps us reach an agreement.
